bibl.title: The Marriage of Roman Soldiers (13 B.C.- A.D. 235). Law and Family in the Imperial Army.

series.title: Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition.

bibl.note: See pp. 22-52: The Papyri; - 395-401: Appendix 1. Papyrus Cattaoui; - 402-403: Appendix 2. B.G.U. I, 140 (Hadrian's Letter).
bibl.seg: PHANG Sara Elise, The Marriage of Roman Soldiers (13 B.C.- A.D. 235). Law and Family in the Imperial Army. (Columbia Studies in the Classical Tradition. 24.)
See pp. 22-52: The Papyri; - 395-401: Appendix 1. Papyrus Cattaoui; - 402-403: Appendix 2. B.G.U. I, 140 (Hadrian's Letter).

C.R. par Richard Alston, CR N.S., 52 (2002) pp. 325-326. - Miroslava Mirkovic, ZSav 120 (2003) pp. 404-408. - John Serrati, JRS 95 (2005) pp. 265-266. - Gabriele Wesch-Klein, Gnomon 77 (2005) pp. 645-648. - Yann Le Bohec, Latomus 63 (2004) pp. 490-492. - Miroslava Mirkovic, ZSav 120 (2003) pp. 404-408. - Susan Treggiari, Phoenix 58 (2004) pp. 377-379.
